dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.abstraction

Class CompilerAbstraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.abstraction.CompilerAbstraction

  • public class CompilerAbstraction
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines compiler abstraction that is used with a CType.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompilerAbstraction

        public CompilerAbstraction(boolean isConst)
        Creates compiler abstraction. The memory class is assumed to be "AUTOMATIC".
        Parameters:
        isConst - Whether the relevant ctype should be declared constant or not.
        Since:
        2008.b

      • CompilerAbstraction

        public CompilerAbstraction(boolean isConst,
                           java.lang.String memClass)
        Creates compiler abstraction.
        Parameters:
        isConst - Whether the relevant ctype should be declared constant or not.
        memClass - The memory class used with this compiler abstraction, not null.
        Since:
        2008.b

      • CompilerAbstraction

        public CompilerAbstraction(boolean isConst,
                           java.lang.String memClass,
                           java.lang.String ptrClass)
        Creates compiler abstraction.
        Parameters:
        isConst - Whether the relevant ctype should be declared constant or not.
        memClass - The memory class used with this compiler abstraction, not null.
        ptrClass - The pointer class used with this compiler abstraction.
        Since:
        2008.b

    • Method Detail

      • isConst

        public boolean isConst()
        Determines whether the relevant ctype should be declared constant.
        Returns:
        true if the ctype should be declared constant.
        Since:
        2008.b

      • memClass

        public java.lang.String memClass()
        Defines the memory class used for compiler abstraction. In most cases the default value "AUTOMATIC" should be used.
        Returns:
        The memory class, never null.
        Since:
        2008.b

      • ptrClass

        public java.lang.String ptrClass()
        The pointer class used for compiler abstraction. Only relevant for pointers.
        Returns:
        The pointer class, never null.
        Since:
        2008.b
